thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: New York Police Sergeant Acquitted of Murder of Mentally-Ill Woman

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: New York Police Sergeant Acquitted of Murder of Mentally-Ill Woman
text:
A Bronx judge on Thursday acquitted a New York City police sergeant accused of murdering a 66-year-old mentally-ill woman allegedly armed with a baseball bat.
New York Police Department Sgt. Hugh Barry faced murder in the second degree, criminally negligent homicide and manslaughter charges for fatally shooting Deborah Danner, a paranoid schizophrenic, in her bedroom in October 2016.
Judge...
